info.title: F5 XC Config API
info.description: F5 Distributed Cloud Config API specifications

tags.name: Configuration
tags.description: Global settings, labels, and configuration management

get.description:
GET is generic label query. Two types of queries are supported
* Return label with exact matching entry label key = label value.
* Return list of labels that have prefix of label key = label value.
Returns list of labels. Query will look into current tenants shared namespace and VES-I/O shared.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized.

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource.

404.description: Returned when resource is not found.

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value.

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently.

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API.

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily.

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
Type of Query

GET all available implicit labels
GET exact match of label.key = label.value Or label.key(label.value)
GET prefix match of label.key = label.value
GET list of all keys
GET list of all labels that exactly match the given key and substring match either 'value' or description provided in 'value' field
GET list of all keys matching a substring.

parameters.name: key_classes
parameters.description:
Key classes

Includes label keys with generic names such as "example-key", "foobar-key" etc.
Keys that are obtained using GET on /API/config/configconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfignamespaces/shared/known_label_keys
Includes F5 Distributed Cloud-defined known label keys such as "F5 XC/app_type", "F5 XC/app" and "F5 XC/siteType" as well as tenant-defined known keys such as
"example-key", "acme-key-foo" and "acme-key-bar". Note that tenant-defined known keys don't have any standard name format - they are known keys because they
have been explicitly created as known keys by the tenant and are stored in the configuration as known_label_keys.
Includes implicit geoip label keys "geoip.F5 XC/city", "geoip.F5 XC/region" and "geoip.F5 XC/country"
Includes implicit label keys associated with packets/requests by the infrastructure e.g. "implicit.F5 XC/namespace"
Include IP reputation label keys "ipreputation.F5 XC/threattype", "ipreputation.F5 XC/threatlevel"
Include URL reputation label keys "urlreputation.F5 XC/category", "urlreputation.F5 XC/reputationlevel"
Includes implicit geoip label keys "geoip.F5 XC/continent"
Includes implicit geoip label keys "geoip.F5 XC/region", "geoip.F5 XC/country" and "geoip.F5 XC/continent"
Implicit AWS resource labels (dynamically queried). This may be VPC level tags and/or subnet level tags.

post.description: Create creates a new label in shared namespace. Any other namespace requested will return error.

Namespace

Kind of View

implicit_labelGetResponse.description: GET Label Response, list of labels.
implicit_labelGetResponse.title: GET Label response.

label.description: List of labels as Query response.
label.title: List of labels.

implicit_labelQueryType.description:
X-displayName: "Label Query"
Type of query for implicit labels

- QUERY_ALL_LABELS: x-displayName: "All Labels"
GET all available implicit labels
- QUERY_EXACT_LABEL: x-displayName: "Exact Label"
GET exact match of label.key = label.value Or label.key(label.value)
- QUERY_VALUE_PREFIX_LABELS: x-displayName: "Label Prefix"
GET prefix match of label.key = label.value
- QUERY_KEYS_ONLY: x-displayName: "Keys Only"
GET list of all keys
- QUERY_VALUE_OR_DESCRIPTION_SUBSTRING: x-displayName: "Value or Description Substring"
GET list of all labels that exactly match the given key and substring match either 'value' or description provided in 'value' field
- QUERY_KEY_SUBSTRING: x-displayName: "Key Substring"
GET list of all keys matching a substring.
implicit_labelQueryType.title: Label Query type.

schemaLabelKeyClass.description:
X-displayName: "LabelKeyClass"
LabelKeyClass is an enumeration of supported label key classes

- KEY_CLASS_GENERIC: x-displayName: "Key Class Generic"
Includes label keys with generic names such as "example-key", "foobar-key" etc.
- KEY_CLASS_KNOWN: x-displayName: "Key Class Known"
Keys that are obtained using GET on /API/config/configconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfigconfignamespaces/shared/known_label_keys
Includes F5 Distributed Cloud-defined known label keys such as "F5 XC/app_type", "F5 XC/app" and "F5 XC/siteType" as well as tenant-defined known keys such as
"example-key", "acme-key-foo" and "acme-key-bar". Note that tenant-defined known keys don't have any standard name format - they are known keys because they
have been explicitly created as known keys by the tenant and are stored in the configuration as known_label_keys.
- KEY_CLASS_GEOIP: x-displayName: "Key Class GeoIp"
Includes implicit geoip label keys "geoip.F5 XC/city", "geoip.F5 XC/region" and "geoip.F5 XC/country"
- KEY_CLASS_IMPLICIT: x-displayName: "Key Class Implicit"
Includes implicit label keys associated with packets/requests by the infrastructure e.g. "implicit.F5 XC/namespace"
- KEY_CLASS_IP_REPUTATION: x-displayName: "Key Class Reputation"
Include IP reputation label keys "ipreputation.F5 XC/threattype", "ipreputation.F5 XC/threatlevel"
- KEY_CLASS_URL_REPUTATION: x-displayName: "Key Class URL Reputation"
Include URL reputation label keys "urlreputation.F5 XC/category", "urlreputation.F5 XC/reputationlevel"
- KEY_CLASS_GEOIP_EXTENDED: x-displayName: "Key Class GeoIp Extended"
Includes implicit geoip label keys "geoip.F5 XC/continent"
- KEY_CLASS_DNS_GEOIP: x-displayName: "Key Class DNS GeoIp"
Includes implicit geoip label keys "geoip.F5 XC/region", "geoip.F5 XC/country" and "geoip.F5 XC/continent"
- KEY_CLASS_AWS: x-displayName: "Key Class AWS"
Implicit AWS resource labels (dynamically queried). This may be VPC level tags and/or subnet level tags.
schemaLabelKeyClass.title: LabelKeyClass.

- QUERY_EXACT_LABEL: x-displayName: "Exact Label"

GET prefix match of label.key = label.value

Type of label key query

- QUERY_ALL_LABEL_KEYS: x-displayName: "All Labels"

schemaViewRefType.description: ViewRefType represents a reference to a view.
schemaViewRefType.title: ViewRefType.

name.description:
When a configuration object(e.g. Virtual_host) refers to another(e.g route)
then name will hold the referred object's(e.g. Route's) name.
name.title: Name

namespace.description:
When a configuration object(e.g. Virtual_host) refers to another(e.g route)
then namespace will hold the referred object's(e.g. Route's) namespace.
namespace.title: Namespace

view_internalGlobalSpecType.description: Shape of the view internal specification.
view_internalGlobalSpecType.title: GlobalSpecType.

allocationMap.description: Allocation Map keeps track of all allocations for this view. The key is the allocator name.
allocationMap.title: Allocation Map.
